wikipedia_page.main: David Ashby (11 November 1949 – 16 September 2015) was a British motorcycle speedway rider, brother of Martin Ashby.

response: Speedway World Championship in 1968. He also finished third in the Speedway World Pairs Championship  in 1969 with Nigel Boocock and was a member of the Great Britain team that won the World Team Cups in 1968 and 1975. His brother David Ashby was a teammate for several years at Swindon
*David Ashby, 65, British motorcycle speedway rider, cancer.Speedway legend David Ashby loses cancer fight
David Ashby (born 1940) was a Conservative member of Parliament in the United Kingdom.
David Ashby may also refer to:
* David Ashby (cricketer) (1852–1934), New Zealand cricket player
* David Ashby (speedway rider) (1949–2015), British motorcycle racer
